entry.title: 2nd
entry.content:
Finally been through the most chaotic period of time and kind of settled down into the new environment, at Bureau of Environmental Inspection.
It's far nicer than I expected, have to admit that, the only thing that bothers me is the dorm. Lacking of private space, not able to focus on anything as my roommate is always watching streams with maximum volumn.
This dorm is like the same age as my parents, may fall apart anytime soon.

Bought a "new" camera, a used one because of the budget. Will be a good companian for the time being a Substitute Services Draftee.
entry.summary: Finally been through the most chaotic period of time and kind of settled down into the new environment, at Bureau of Environmenta
